226:1: cittaprasādodgataṃ pātrātiśayapratipāditaṃ ca nālpakaṃ nāma dānamasti vipākamahattvāt|
226:7: tatyāja dṛptānapi tasya śatrūn rakteva reme tadapāśriteṣu|
226:9: dharmātmakatvānna ca nāma tasya paropatāpāśivamāsa cetaḥ|
226:10: bhṛtyānurāgastu tathā jajṛmbhe dviṣatsu lakṣmīrna yathāsya reme||3||
226:12: tadanusmaraṇācca samupajātasaṃvego viśeṣavattaraṃ śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyaḥ sukhahetunidānaṃ dānamadācchīlasaṃvaramanavarataṃ pupoṣa poṣadhaniyamaṃ ca parvadivaseṣu samādade|
226:13: abhīkṣṇaṃ ca rājā parṣadi svasmiṃścāntaḥpure puṇyaprabhāvodbhāvanāllokaṃ śreyasi niyoktukāmaḥ pratītahṛdayo gāthādvayamiti niyatārthaṃ babhāṣe-
226:22: tamamātyā brāhmaṇavṛddhāḥ pauramukhyāśca kautūhalādhūrṇitamanaso'pi na prasahante sma paryanuyoktuṃ kimabhisamīkṣya mahārājo gāthādvayamidamabhīkṣṇaṃ bhāṣata iti|
226:23: atha tasya rājño vāgnityatvādavyāhatatarapraṇayaprasarā devī samutpannakautūhalā saṃkathāprastāvāgataṃ parṣadi paryapṛcchadenam|
226:25: bhavati mama kutūhalākulaṃ hṛdayamidaṃ kathitena tena te||6||
226:26: tadarhati śrotumayaṃ jano yadi pracakṣva tatkiṃ nviti bhāṣase nṛpa|
226:27: rahasyamevaṃ ca na kīrtyate kvacitprakāśamasmācca mayāpi pṛcchyate||7||
226:28: atha sa rājā prītyabhisnigdhayā dṛṣṭyā samabhivīkṣya devīṃ smitapravikasitavadana uvāca-
226:32: puraṃ ca sāntaḥpuramatra tena me niśamyatāṃ yena mayaivamucyate||9||
226:46: puṇyena ca labhe tṛptimarhatāṃ darśanena ca||13||
226:47: atha sā devī praharṣavismayaviśālākṣī sabahumānamudīkṣamāṇā rājānamityuvāca|
226:50: tadevameva pāpapravṛttivimukhaḥ piteva prajānāṃ samyakparipālanasumukhaḥ puṇyagaṇārjanābhimukhaḥ|
226:58: atha sa rājā devīṃ devīmiva śriyā jvalantīmabhisnigdhamavekṣya śrīsampattihetukutūhalahṛdayaḥ punaruvāca-
226:62: kathaya kathayedānīmiti ca sādaraṃ rājñā paryanuyuktovāca-
226:69: kṣīṇāsraveṣu na kṛtaṃ tanu nāma kiñci-
226:71: atha sa rājā puṇyaphalapradarśanātpuṇyeṣu samutpāditabahumānāmabhiprasannamanasaṃ parṣadaṃ vismayaikāgrāmavetya niyatamīdṛśaṃ kiñcitsamanuśaśāsa-
226:74: naiva draṣṭumapi kṣamaḥ sa puruṣaḥ paryāptavitto'pi san
226:76: tyaktavyaṃ vivaśena yanna ca tathā kasmaicidarthāya yat
226:78: ko'sau tatra bhajeta matsarapathaṃ jānanguṇānāṃ rasaṃ
226:87: diti parigaṇitārthaḥ ko na dānāni dadyāt||22||
226:90: atha sā parṣattasya rājñastadgrāhakaṃ vacanaṃ sabahumānamabhinandya pradānādipratipattyabhimukhī babhūva|
226:91: tadevaṃ cittaprasādodgataṃ pātrātiśayapratipāditaṃ ca nālpakaṃ nāma dānamasti vipākamahattvāditi prasannacittenānuttare puṇyakṣetra āryasaṃghe dānaṃ dadatā parā prītirutpādayitavyā|
226:92: adūre mamāpyevaṃvidhā ato viśiṣṭatarāśca sampattaya iti|
